metadata.dc:author: Canalda Sahli, C
metadata.dc:description: A case is presented of a periapical lesion of a rather large size, which produced an important separation of two inferior incisor roots. The root canal was treated, with calcium hydroxide overextending the apex. Clinic and radiographic control after two years complete reparation of the periapex.
metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento endodóncico de una lesión periapical causante de separación radicular.
[Endodontic treatment of a periapical lesion causing root separation].
